collapsePages: Hide pagination when records less than half of a default page

table.bordered: Allows a border to be visible
table.cellbordered: Allows each cell to be bordered
table.overflow: Hides cells if the Table overflows it's container
table.fullwidth: Allows the table to be forced full-width
table.filename: Override the default filename of the CSV Exporting
table.isSelectable: Enables a checkbox for selecting the row

settings.isAllowed: Allow settings to be controlled or configured

sortIndicator.isVisible: Show or Hide the Sort Indicator

filter.isVisible: Show or Hide the Filter Options

columns.isVisible: Show or Hide the Column Options
